data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Garhwal.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Garhwal, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Garhwal, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Garhwal access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Garhwal.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jat Pachhade people.
Jesus, 687,300 people live in the county of Garhwal. Please, give them 137 new simple churches this year.
Over 97.69 percent of the people of Garhwal are far from Jesus.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Garhwal who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Garhwal
location.people_groups_list: Rajput (Muslim traditions), Rajput Nayak, Rajput Joia (Muslim traditions), Bania Bishnoi, Bhuyiar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput (Muslim traditions) (2,893,000), Rajput Nayak (23,000), Rajput Joia (Muslim traditions) (1,900), Bania Bishnoi (19,000), Bhuyiar (33,000)
